glossdef.p: Another hackneyed word; like factor it usually adds nothing to the sentence in which it occurs.

row.entry: A feature of the entertainment especially worthy of mention was the singing of Miss A.
(Better use the same number of words to tell what Miss A. sang, or if the programme has already been given, to tell how she sang.)

glossdef.p: As a verb, in the advertising sense of offer as a special attraction, to be avoided.
